General.Name: Engie Energia Chile SA
General.Description: Engie Energia Chile S.A. engages in the generation, transmission, and supply of electricity to mining sectors in Chile. The company transports natural gas and offers energy solutions. It is also involved in renewable energy related business. The company has an installed capacity of 2,300 megawatts and 3,000 kilometers of transmission lines. Engie Energia Chile S.A. was founded in 1981 and is based in Las Condes, Chile. The company operates as a subsidiary of ENGIE LATAM SA.
